job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pstrongRole Senior Machine Learning EngineerstrongppstrongReports to strongMachine Learning ManagerppstrongLocation strongRemoteppstrongHours strongFull timeppbrppstrongAbout TrevorstrongppThe Trevor Project is the worlds largest suicide prevention and crisis intervention organization for LGBTQ young people We are a nonprofit that provides 247 lifesaving support via phone text and chat We also operate the worlds largest safe space social networking site for LGBTQ youth and run innovative research education and advocacy programs Weve been saving lives every day for over 20 yearsppbrppstrongOverview of the rolestrongppOur Senior Machine Learning Engineer will contribute to The Trevor Projects lifesaving work by developing machine learning and natural language processing models that drive significant increases in quality of care and scalability for our crisis services and other internal processes This individual will help the team contribute to the development of the machine learning models from concept to productionization and integrate them across our platforms and services The successful candidate will work closely with domain experts across The Trevor Project and will leverage advice and expertise from external partners and advisorsppnbspppstrongWho you arestrongpullistrongExperienced strongYou have significant experience in machine learning using one of these libraries TensorFlow PyTorch Keras Scikitlearn and natural language processing in a hightech environment You have developed highperforming models from concept to web production and you understand fundamental statistical methodologieslilistrongPerpetual Learner strongYou are energized by learning about new topics and can quickly get up to speed and contribute to initiativeslilistrongInnovativestrong You stay uptodate on the latest research in AI but always approach the problemsolving process first with practical simple and proven methodslilistrongCollaborativestrong You closely interact with various members of crossfunctional teams to accomplish shared goals related to product developmentnbsplilistrongCommunicativestrong People love how you can explain complex concepts in a way that everyone can understandlilistrongOrganizedstrong You know how to manage multiple projects and prioritize appropriately You create clear and logical systems and processes to support your work and that of the organizationlilistrongUser Experience strongYou can put yourself in the shoes of the audience and oversee operations that prioritize their experiencelilistrongEmpathetic strongYou care and respect those around you regardless of race ethnic origin gender age sexual orientation gender identity and physical abilitylilistrongPassionate strongYou care about LGBTQ youth You care about saving lives You want to come to work and feel inspired every day You want to change the worldlilistrongFun strongThe work we do is very serious but that doesnt mean we dont have fun We know how to have a good time and you should tooliulpstrong	strongppstrongWhat youll dostrongpulliTrain and test machine learning and natural language processing models eg BERT GPT2 etc in accordance with internally defined best practicesliliDevelop solutions and new approaches to a range of other machine learning tasks including sourcing and labeling training data evaluating data privacy protection etcliliAssist in deploying machine learning solutions and monitoring for system reliability and fairness in accordance with internally defined standards for fairness accountability and transparencyliliLearn the latest techniques and stay apprised of the latest research in machine learning and natural language processingliliBrainstorm and work closely with stakeholders to identify areas where machine learning solutions provide valueliliHave the opportunity to write formal research papers on our machine learning work and submit to conferences and peerreviewed journalsliliMentor and guide other members of the machine learning teamliliAssist in managing relationships with external collaboratorsliliWork with domain experts to understand our external and internal processesliulpbrppstrongBenefitsstrongpulliGenerous vacation and holidays like a full day off to celebrate Harvey Milk Day including three halfday Fridays during the summerliliComprehensive health insurance we pay 100 of your premiums for medical dental and life including gender affirmation surgeryliliFlexibility to work from anywhere in the US we provide the technology a monthly internet stipend and reimbursement to outfit your workfromhome spaceliliFun virtual office environment and passionate teamnbspliliOnline Subscription to Headspace a digital meditation platformliliThe Trevor Project is an equal opportunity employerliliMeaningful work at an organization that is saving the lives of LGBTQ young people across America every dayliulpbrppbrppstrongYour ApplicationstrongppWere excited to hear from you To join Team Trevor please upload a resume and cover letter Applications without cover letters will not be considered  use this as an opportunity to convey why you want to be the next Senior Machine Learning Engineer at The Trevor Projectp
